properties.Name: Fairy Forest
properties.Description: Delight in the wonderful fairy lights in the trees outside of Riverside.

properties.Name: Daleks
properties.Description: Calling all Dr Who fans, check out three fabulously scary Daleks.

properties.Name: Stars in the River
properties.Description: The Avon River and surrounding trees will be transformed to seem as if the heavens have descended to earth.

properties.Name: Tīrama Mai
properties.Description: Tirama Mai logo in lights

properties.Name: Night Creatures
properties.Description: Night creatures will appear in the island on the Avon, thrilling young and old alike.

properties.Name: Dancing Fountain
properties.Location: Scott Statue Reserve, cnr Worcester and Oxford Terrace
properties.Description: Watch the water dance to music.

properties.Name: Antarctica Reel
properties.Location: Scott Statue Reserve, cnr Worcester and Oxford Terrace
properties.Description: Amazing footage from the Antarctic showing the night sky, ice shelves, penguins and whales.

properties.Name: Scott of the Antarctic
properties.Location: Scott Statue Reserve, cnr Worcester and Oxford Terrace
properties.Description: Projection onto Scott's Statue, he will appear to walk through snow storms and blizzards

properties.Name: River on Worcester
properties.Location: Christchurch City Council Civic Offices,  Worcester Boulevard ramp
properties.Description: The Pou and ramp will come to life with a projection of a flowing river and eels.

properties.Name: Christchurch Arts Centre light projection
properties.Description: Spectacular lighting display enhancing the stunning architecture with colour and light.

properties.Name: Canterbury Musuem light projection
properties.Description: The museum facade will be awash with colour.

properties.Name: Tree of Bees
properties.Description: The bees will appear to buzz around a hive, a sweet little installation for the whole family.

properties.Name: Triangles on the Green
properties.Description: Vividly coloured triangles that look amazing in the dark.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki
properties.Description: Amazing cubes designed and created by local artists - Ngao meaning the core energy source of Matariki that is influencing change and a new surge of energy representing the New Year.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki
properties.Description: Amazing cubes designed and created by local artists - Ngao meaning the core energy source of Matariki that is influencing change and a new surge of energy representing the New Year.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki
properties.Description: Amazing cubes designed and created by local artists - Ngao meaning the core energy source of Matariki that is influencing change and a new surge of energy representing the New Year.

properties.Name: Walkway of Light
properties.Description: Explore this tunnel of light featuring LED lighting.

properties.Name: Bowker Fountain String Sculpture
properties.Description: String art like its never been seen before, water and light will make the strings dance.

properties.Name: Ferrier Fountain
properties.Description: The Ferrier Fountain will be lit up and the Avon Room facing Victoria Square will glow with light.

properties.Name: Canterbury Club light projection
properties.Description: The Canterbury Club will be lit up in beautiful soft lighting.

properties.Name: New Brighton Pier light projection
properties.Description: The Pier will be lit up in different colours.

properties.Name: Triangles on the Green Part II
properties.Location: He Puna Taimoana: New Brighton hot pools
properties.Description: Triangles that look fantastic in the dark in a variety of colours.

properties.Name: The Lone Tree
properties.Description: Uplighting of the Pine tree by New Brighton Library.

properties.Name: New Brighton Library light projection
properties.Description: Spectacular coloured light show, highlighting the sails along the front of the Library.

properties.Name: Lighting Ball
properties.Description: Large globe suspended in the air.

properties.Name: Shop light projection
properties.Description: Projection in the Recreate window.

properties.Name: New Regent Street light projection
properties.Description: New Regent Street will glow with light.

properties.Name: Tāhū o ngā Maunga Tūmatakahuki
properties.Description: The vividly coloured mural by Kelcy Taratoa will come to life with stunning lighting.

properties.Name: Exhibition Panels
properties.Description: Discover the story of Matariki and the significance of the stars.
